name: df-rmy
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(crmy, cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cuz, nat2), cz, cfv(c2nd, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s2, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)))))), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, cv(s1))))))
comment: Define the X sequence as the irrational part of some solution of a special Pell equation. See ~ frmy and ~ rmxyval for a more useful but non-eliminable definition. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)
